title: Booking platform
description: A full-stack booking website built with Vue 3, TypeScript, Express.js, MongoDB, and Clerk for authentication. Users can search and filter properties, book available ones, and manage their bookings and favorites.

title: Online Forum
description: This project is built with Next.js, Typescript, MongoDB, Tailwind and Clerk. It is a platform where users can create an account, post questions, and comment on other users' threads. Checkout the GitHub repository for more of a detailed description.

title: Teacher platform
description: This project is built with Next.js, Tailwind and Convex. It is a platform aimed for teacher where they can easily access teaching materials. The platform is built with a responsive design and a user-friendly interface. Please checkout the GitHub repository for more of a detailed description.

title: Social media application
description: This project is built with React, Redux toolkit, Tailwind, Node.js, Express and MongoDB. It's a responsive social media platform aimed at fostering connections between users through posting content, adding friends, and engaging with each other's posts. Users can create posts with text and images, connect with others by adding them to their friends list, and interact by liking and commenting on posts. The project is still a work in progress and was built as part of the CS50x course.
